TopicTitle: Building bases with Kerbal Attachment System gone wrong...............

Articles.Content:
So hey everyone.... I play ksp 1.11.2, and i installed the KAS mod to help make things easier.... But as i got a base on the suface of Duna, i tried linking the modules with the JS-1 joint sockets, but i am not able to do so......

Is there any way my mod installs could be the reason?(I use ckan)....

Thanks in advance for your help..............:)

Screenshots please, it’s usually easier to see the problem than to describe it. A mod list would also help- in CKAN click File then Save installed mod list, then copy the contents of that file and paste it here.
